title: Price drop for stunning  just-renovated duplex apartment with parking
posting_body: ['Just renovated throughout:  Large 2 BR+ apartment on quiet residential street in quiet 2F house with separate entrances.', 'Brand new kitchen and bath: custom kitchen cabinets, granite countertops, stainless steel gas range, dishwasher, microwave, disposal.', 'Complete bathroom renovation with all new shower, tub, tile, vanity, floors, mirrors.', 'New electrical and plumbing throughout.', 'All refinished hardwood floors, new windows, well-insulated, with ample storage and laundry in house.', 'Freshly painted.', 'Open floor-plan living room and dining room.', 'Eat-in-kitchen, three bedrooms with closets, largest bedroom has attached flexible bonus room (could be used for home office, yoga room, extra storage.)', 'Private front and back porches.', 'Driveway and on-street parking available.', 'Garage parking negotiable.', 'Safe, friendly neighborhood.', 'Steps away from 71 bus to Watertown Sq. /', 'Harvard Sq.; 5 minutes by car to new shops, movie theater, and restaurants  at Arsenal Yards; great diners, cafes and shops in Coolidge and Watertown Squares.', 'Well maintained home.', 'No realtor fee,  no smoking, no dogs/cats negotiable', 'Available September 1']
